crazyballrun.game.gui.GUIControl

      Create an instance of a specified GUIControl.
      GUIControl GUIFrame.getControl(java.lang.String id)
      Finds a GUIControl by its id.

    • Uses of GUIControl in crazyballrun.game.gui.controls

      Subclasses of GUIControl in crazyballrun.game.gui.controls 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CBButton
      The CBButtonSimple (CB = CrazyBallrun) an optional button control which may be used without appropriate image.
      class  CBFrame
      The CBFrameSimple (CB = CrazyBallrun) is a basic GUI-Control to combine several other GUIControls on it visually.
      class  CBLevelDescription
      The CBLevelDescription gui control displays information about a selected level.
      class  CBListBox
      Simple ListBox GUI-element which can be used for game settings and file- and folder-selection.
      class  CBLoadImage
      The CBLoadImage control is a full-screen picture for a particular level's load-screen.
      class  CBTextBox
      CBTextBox is a user interface control for text input.
